content: this pattern is knit up quick with two strands of worsted weight wool held together knit one up this weekend perfect for fall halloween and thanksgiving decor these also make a great hostess gift or toy stuffy for a little pumpkin lover sizes small medium large approximate measurements small - 9 23cm diameter 5 5 14cm tall medium - 11 28cm diameter 6 5 16 5cm tall large - 13 33cm diameter 7 5 19cm tall pumpkin in featured photo is medium size notes included in the instructions to make bigger and taller yarn and materials knit with 2 strands of worsted weight yarn held together you will need approximately 122 yd 164 yd 192 yd / 112m 150m 175m each of 2 colours for the main pumpkin the stem is also knit with 2 strands held together you will need a small amount of each colour poly-fil approximately 3 5oz 5 3oz 7oz / 100g 150g 200g for the main pumpkin and a small amount for the stem needles tools and notions set of us10 5 6 5mm double point needles us 10 5 6 5mm circular needle 16 40cm removable stitch marker darning needle ribs of the pumpkin are separated by a line of purl stitches which are wrapped with yarn later for shaping the stem is knit separately and sewn onto the pumpkin at the end
